job_history.work_description: Leading sales counselor for first consecutive 6 months. Voted best Customer Service Employee General Manager throughout district. Largest and Highest consecutive sales, revenue, generated employees. Developed and Promoted 5 company General Managers for La Fitness. Highest overall ranking V-Class numbers. Generated highest revenue based profitable New Jersey Club. Nominated for Customer Service General Manager of the Year. Achieved Senior/Regional GM. Responsible for training and development of Co-General Managers in North east region.

Must conform to all federal and state department of transportation qualifications. Ensure a safe and timely delivery of all UPS packages from hub to hub. Responsible for all customer pick up and deliveries.

Transport Pepsi raw materials from hub to hub and key distribution centers. Adhere to all State and Federal DOT laws and regulations. Condition and maintain Driver, and Truck Safety. Report to upper management in delivery, pick-up, and business matters.

Controlled all Business Operations of the Club. Researched and devised marketing, financial and feasibility reports concerning new business acquisitions and acquisition prospects. Maintain budget for past due accounts, manage payroll and supply margins and uphold company sales quotas. Initiated multiple joint ventures and corporate relations to increase monthly profits margins on customers business in the U.S.

Worked consistently with Upper Management in major food accounts for retail and sale promotional distributions. Planned and managed all Pepsi Costumer Service Accounts. Ordered all retail Pepsi products for major food chains in Northern New Jersey.

Assist General Manager with Sales, Marketing, Advertising, and employee Management. Focus on daily key performance indicators to drive profitability. Work with Sr. GM with development of weekly game plans to ensure revenue is 5% higher then previous years bankable gross/eft.

Generate Sales for company profit. Generate sales reports and understand critical numbers to impact your business. Embrace the role of 'The Mayor' your health club, by greeting members, cultivating relationships, and encouraging connectivity providing a welcoming environment for members and guests.

Develop all extracurricular sports programs for Corporate Office at Club Level. Organized Basketball and Racquetball Leagues throughout North Jersey La Fitness locations. Analyzed all statistics, data, and systems of the sports programs.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Extensive experience as a General Manager, Assistant General Manager, and Sports Director, with a proven track record of developing and promoting employees, and achieving high sales and revenue targets.

skills.name: Sales and Marketing
skills.explanation: Proven success in generating sales, developing marketing reports, and driving profitability, with a strong focus on key performance indicators.

skills.name: Customer Service
skills.explanation: Award-winning customer service skills, with a strong focus on providing a welcoming environment for members and guests, and cultivating relationships to drive business growth.

skills.name: Financial Management
skills.explanation: Experience with managing budgets, payroll, and supply margins, as well as developing financial reports and feasibility studies.

skills.name: Project Management
skills.explanation: Proven ability to manage multiple projects and initiatives, including developing and implementing marketing campaigns, and managing employee development programs.

skills.name: Data Analysis
skills.explanation: Experience with analyzing statistics and data to inform business decisions, particularly in the context of sports programs and sales reports.

skills.name: Transportation and Logistics
skills.explanation: Experience as a driver and transportation manager, with a focus on ensuring safe and timely delivery of packages and products.

skills.name: Team Management
skills.explanation: Proven ability to manage and develop teams, with a focus on driving business growth and achieving high performance targets.
